hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ]; then case "$FILE_PATH" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json) npx biome check --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true ;; esac; fi

FILE_PATH=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ]; then case "$FILE_PATH" in *.env*|*credentials*|*secret*) echo "Blocked: cannot write to sensitive file $FILE_PATH" >&2; exit 2 ;; esac; fi
echo 'Reminder: Run npx biome check --write . and cargo clippy before committing.'
